title: Chelsea vs Newcastle LIVE score: Team news, TV channel and live stream details
text:
Chelsea can climb into the top four of the Premier League with victory over Newcastle at Stamford Bridge.

Frank Lampard's side have bounced back from a slow start, losing just once since the opening day - against leaders Liverpool.

In Tammy Abraham, they have the joint-top scorer in the league and he will hope to add to his tally against Newcastle.

The Magpies have started slowly but picked up a massive win over Manchester United before the international break.

Follow all the action from the Premier League clash at Stamford Bridge. Kick-off is at 3pm (UK).

Chelsea: Kepa, Azpilicueta, Tomori, Zouma, Alonso, Jorginho, Barkley, Willian, Mount, Hudson-Odoi, Abraham

Newcastle: Dubravka, Yedlin, Lascelles, Schar, Clark, Willems, S Longstaff, M Longstaff, Saint-Maximim, Almiron, Joelinton

The match is not being shown live on TV in the UK.
description: Follow all the action from the Premier League clash at Stamford Bridge. Kick-off is at 3pm (UK).
